description: The `ballerinax/sap.s4hana.api_masterinspcharacteristic_srv` package offers APIs for seamless integration with the [Master Inspection Characteristic - Read API v2.0.0](https://api.sap.com/api/API_MASTERINSPCHARACTERISTIC_SRV/overview).A master inspection characteristic is a master data record that describes the quality inspection criteria for materials. This service enables you to retrieve, for example, the settings and the control indicators defined for a master inspection characteristic.
